wikitext.*:
'''BAT''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "tread".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351 (root appearing as "BAT-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''bata'' ("beaten track, pathway")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''bád'' ("beaten track, pathway");<ref name=LR/><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 7 ("''bâd''" -> "''bád''")</ref> ''batho'' ("trample")<ref name=LR/>

{{references}}
